property.name: message
property.value: Ah, you made it. I wasn't sure if the stairs would just drop you into the void with no way out until your eventual death. What do you suppose those black squares are, down there?\n\nWalk down to them and check them out.

property.name: message
property.value: Oh. I suppose those are bottomless pits. I guess now you'll be falling through the void with no way out until your eventual death.\n\nI suggest you press U to UNDO your foolish mistake!

property.name: message
property.value: Right, that's quite enough of that. Never mind the pits then, I think the key here is circumventing them using those doors.\n\nExperiment a bit and see what you can do.

property.name: message
property.value: Ahah, wonderful! Now that is a useful trick if you ever come across the pestiferous pits again. Looks like you can head on over to the stairs, and see what awaits you in the next room.
